org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.ser

Class StreamMarshaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.ser.StreamMarshaller

  • public class StreamMarshaller
extends Object
    Associates a marshaller and an unmarshaller with the identified stream. The associated marshallers must be able to round-trip content. That is, content marshalled by an instance of this class must also be able to be unmarshalled by the same instance of this class, and vice versa.
